history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind. sfirstorder depth: 3. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind,plus1.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply star_ind with (P := fun y z => plus R x z).
exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variables R, x.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
exceptions.tactic: apply plus1 with (y := z0) in H1.
exceptions.exn: The reference z0 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
apply plus1 with (y := y) in H1.
apply plus_star in H1.
exceptions.tactic: intros y0 x0 z0 H3 H4 IH.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
apply plus1 with (y := y) in H1.
apply plus_star in H1.
exceptions.exn: The reference x0 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
apply plus1 with (y := y) in H1.
apply plus_star in H1.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (X : Type) (R : relation X) (P : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, P x x) -> (forall y x z : X, R x y -> star R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x x0 : X, star R x x0 -> P x x0 r : forall X : Type, relation X -> relation X X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : star R x y H2 : star R y z Unable to unify "exists2 y : X, R ?M1762 y & star R y ?M1763" with "r X R x z".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind.
apply plus1 with (y := y) in H1.
apply plus_star in H1.
qsimpl time: 1 use: plus,star_ind,plus1.
exceptions.exn: The reference y0 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply star_ind with (P := fun y z => plus R x z). - intro z0. apply plus1 with (y := z0) in H1. apply plus_star in H1. auto. - intros y0 x0 z0 H3 H4 IH. apply plus_trans with (y := x0). ++ apply plus1. auto. ++ apply plus_star_plus with (y := y0); auto.
